plugins.label: Blank
plugins.desc: Create a blank plugin with a minimal amount of code.

plugins.label: Content Only
plugins.desc: Create a blank plugin that can only contain content.

plugins.label: Blueprint Library
plugins.desc: Create a plugin that will contain Blueprint Function Library.

plugins.label: Editor Mode
plugins.desc: Create a plugin that will have an editor mode. Includes a toolkit example to specify UI that will appear in 'Modes' selection (next to Foliage, Landscape, etc). It will also include very basic UI that demostrates editor interaction and undo/redo function usage.

plugins.label: Editor Mode
plugins.desc: Create a plugin that will have an editor mode. Includes a toolkit example to specify UI that will appear in 'Modes' selection (next to Foliage, Landscape, etc). It will also include very basic UI that demostrates editor interaction and undo/redo function usage.

plugins.label: Editor Standalone Window
plugins.desc: Create a plugin that will add a button in the Window Menu that summons an empty standalone tab window when clicked.

plugins.label: Editor Standalone Window
plugins.desc: Create a plugin that will add a button in the Window Menu that summons an empty standalone tab window when clicked.

plugins.label: Editor Toolbar Button
plugins.desc: Create a plugin that will add a button to the toolbar in the Level Editor. Start by implementing something in the created 'OnButtonClick' event.

plugins.label: Editor Toolbar Button
plugins.desc: Create a plugin that will add a button to the toolbar in the Level Editor. Start by implementing something in the created 'OnButtonClick' event.

plugins.label: Third Party Library
plugins.desc: Create a plugin that uses an included third party library. This can be used as an example of how to include, load and use a third party library yourself.

plugins.label: Third Party Library
plugins.desc: Create a plugin that uses an included third party library. This can be used as an example of how to include, load and use a third party library yourself.

classes.label: Empty
classes.desc: An empty C++ class with a default contructor and destructor.

classes.label: Character
classes.desc: A Character is a type of Pawn that includes the ability to walk around.

classes.label: Pawn
classes.desc: A Pawn is an actor than can be 'possessed' and receive input from a controller.

classes.label: Actor
classes.desc: An Actor is an object that can be placed or spawned in the world.

classes.label: Actor Component
classes.desc: An ActorComponent is a reusable component that can be added to any actor.

classes.label: Scene Component
classes.desc: A SceneComponent is a component that has a scene transform and can be attached to other scene components.

classes.label: Player Camera Manager
classes.desc: A PlayerCameraManager is responsible for managing the camera for a particular player.

classes.label: Player Controller
classes.desc: A PlayerController is an actor responsible for controlling a Pawn used by the player.

classes.label: Game Mode Base
classes.desc: A GameModeBase defines the game being played, its rules, scoring and other facets of the game type.

classes.label: World Settings
classes.desc: A WorldSettings is an Actor containing all script accessible world properties.

classes.label: HUD
classes.desc: Base class of the heads-up display.

classes.label: Player State
classes.desc: A PlayerState is created for every player on a server (or in a standalone game).

classes.label: Game State Base
classes.desc: A GameStateBase is a class that manages the game's global state and is spawned by GameModeBase.

classes.label: Blueprint Function Library
classes.desc: This class is a base class for any function libraries exposed to blueprints.

classes.label: Slate Widget
classes.desc: A custom Slate widget, deriving from SCompoundWidget.

classes.label: Slate Widget Style
classes.desc: A custom Slate widget style, deriving from FSlateWidgetStyle, along with its associated UObject wrapper class.

classes.label: Unreal Interface
classes.desc: A UObject Interface class, to be implemented by other UObject-based classes.

classes.label: UObject
classes.desc: A class who inherits from UObject.
